txt.en: Thraknûl's torture devices line the walls of Naerband. His torturers inflict pain upon Thraknûl's enemies and victims. Seeing these atrocities firsthand, you take it upon yourself to put a stop to these vile activities.
Naerband is located in Talath Úrui.\n\nYou should defeat Uruk torturers and destroy torture devices in Naerband.
Defeated Uruk torturers and destroyed torture devices in Naerband.
Naerband is located in Talath Úrui.\n\nYou should defeat Uruk torturers and destroy torture devices in Naerband.
The prison fortress of Naerband is populated by vile acts and jailed denizens.
You have successfully defeated many Uruk torturers and destroyed their torture devices in Naerband.
Defeat Uruk torturers and destroy torture devices in Naerband
